problem_summary_simple: Find splits where the left part's sum is greater than or equal to the right part's sum.
problem_summary_technical: Use prefix sums to efficiently calculate left and right sums. Iterate through possible split points and check the condition.
key_insights: The problem can be solved efficiently by using prefix sums to calculate subarray sums in O(1) time.
We need to iterate through all possible split points (excluding the last element) and check the condition.
The total sum of the array is needed to calculate the right subarray sum from the left subarray sum.
